const BASE_URL="http://localhost:8000/api";// Replace with your backend API base URL
export const getFileList=async(userName,files,setgetFileListStatus,setFiles)=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/files-list/"),{method:"GET"});const data=await response.json();setFiles(data.files);setgetFileListStatus("success");}catch(error){console.error("Failed to fetch file list:",error);setgetFileListStatus("fail");}};
